system.description: Essence Dragons ensure that their guardians can easily commune with the land and the spirits within. You know the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.5o1rvwzxmsh5ji9i]{Druidcraft} cantrip. In addition, your diplomatic understanding extends towards the creatures of the land and the spirits within it. You gain an expertise die on Charisma checks made to influence beast and celestial creatures.
